product_name: Royal Robbins Urban Garden Dress - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Made of comfortable stretch jersey with a forgiving print, the Royal Robbins Urban Garden Dress lets you putter around in the garden and pick some flowers before your guests arrive. Cotton/polyester/spandex jersey fabric is soft and stretchy, and holds its shape; it also wicks moisture away from the skin, resists wrinkling and dries quickly. Integrated UPF 50+ sun protection. The knee-length Royal Robbins Urban Garden Dress features a V-neck with ruching at the bodice. Closeout.
short_description: Made of comfortable stretch jersey with a forgiving print, the Royal Robbins Urban Garden Dress lets you putter around in the garden and pick some flowers before your guests arrive.
